note:
My interests include travel, language learning (ES/DE/HU/PT), politics, coding, and maximizing my leisure time.

Soy estadounidense. I've done a tourism or two in Latin America and Europe, and months-long sojourns in Mexico, Japan, Poland, Hungary, and Costa Rica. I pay the bills working as a professor of ESL and Spanish at a Midwestern community college.

Language exchange note: If you speak Hungarian and want to work on your English, contact me about setting up regular language exchanges!
